system.description: The character's paranoia and constant vigilance make it nearly impossible to catch them off guard.
system.benefit: You are constantly wary of attacks from all sides. As long as your senses are not impaired such as through a blindfold or drugs (GM Discretion), you cannot be Surprised.

prerequisites.text: Legend of the Expanse Alternate Advance, 500xp. Awareness, Light Sleeper, Paranoia, Perception 40+

system.notes: Requires Legend of the Expanse Alternate Advance

specialAbilities.name: Cannot Be Surprised
specialAbilities.description: As long as your senses are not impaired, you cannot be Surprised.
